alert.note: Alert for Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 5:50AM EST until January 13 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In eastern New York, the Helderbergs, Greater Capital Region, Mohawk Valley, northern Catskills, southern Adirondacks, and Lake George Saratoga Region. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur in higher terrain areas and along north and west facing slopes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
